title: Is this a valid face mask exemption card?
subtitle: The exemption cards referring to the Americans with Disabilities Act encouraged people to challenge mask requirements during the outbreak of the Corona virus.
author: Nur Ibrahim
vclaim: The United States Department of Justice issued a card exempting its holders from wearing face masks on the grounds that they posed a health risk to them because of medical conditions that they were not required to disclose under the authority of the Americans with Disabilities Act.
